> The other reason is that I like to draw boobs, and abs. :D

Made me laugh; MonoriRogue is great.
Oh so gender bent Graves can have a cigar but Graves can't have a cigar?

The thing i always dislike about genderbend art, is that when some people make males into females, they often give them way less armor then the original (not that i mind seeing sexy women). I think the armor is part of the character and when they do it that way, i feel like it's a completely different person. These drawings are great examples of what you shoukd do, try to keep the same amount of clothes (although some male characters don't wear shirts, and it makes sense to cover the boobs, so it doesn't become explicit)
If boobs are explicit then why are man boobs not?
Because a man can be out in public with a bare torso and not  be arrested lol
So what you're saying is that a man can be out in public with a bare torso and not get arrested, but Graves can't have his damn cigar?

Last time I checked, man boobs weren't used for reproduction/keeping that produced thing alive... weird excuse but that's the, in all reasoning, the purpose for society to censor stuff.

I know, people are strange....

ACTUALLY ITS BEEN THEORIZED THAT THE REASON THAT MEN HAVE NIPPLES IS THAT ANCIENT MAN USED TO HELP WITH BREAST FEEDING IN SOME SITUATIONS, FOR EXAMPLE IF TWO PRE-HISTORIC HUMANS WERE TO HAVE A BABY AND THE WOMAN WERE TO DIE THE MALE WOULD BREAST FEED THE CHILD. SO HA! IF THE MAN HAS NIPPLES AND IS SHIRTLESS IN A MODERN SOCIETY IT IS JUST AS REASONABLE TO ARREST HIM AS IT IS TO ARREST A WOMAN #NIPPLEFACTS
PPPPPLLLLLEEEAAAASSSEEE tell me that was sarcasm. Men have nips because male chromosomes develop after female ones do...not some bs about men breast feeding.
did anyone else notice there isnt a single male champion xD

I think Ekko's genderbent too
Wow another unrealistic standard set for women. Abs and boobs.

ALL women have abs and boobs just FYI. Some women have more fat over their abs.
Also just cause someone draws a character like that, doesn't mean they think everyone should try to look like that. YOU are making assumptions and getting a bad message on your own. Also in a lot of video games and comic books, all the heroes are huge muscled men with chiseled jaws and great hair. But you don't see people complaining about that.
This is what you call sarcasm. But I guess it was funny since someone got triggered.
I wasn't actually triggered. That was also sarcasm.

so gender bent {{champion:104}}  can have a cigar, but real {{champion:104}}  cant even have a cigar

Back in my basement dweller days with nothing better to do, I used to watch his stream every morning (12am - 7am RIP SLEEP SCHEDULE), since he's 12 hours ahead in Taiwan. I remember the first stream too, Neon Strike Vi! 

Now I've got a job and can't watch as often, but I'm happy to see him continue to grow and I feel like a proud dad seeing him actually getting recognition from Riot! Never thought I'd see the kid on the home page of the League Client :') 

Monori is cool and has a sick playlist, if you get a chance definitely check out his stream!

So a genderbent Graves can have a cigar,
but classic Graves can't have a goddamn cigar?!
That Lulu art though...
